response.overview: Christmas images and classic carols combine to offer a fun and educational introduction to the holidays in this release that proves it's never to early to get into the Christmas spirit. Not only does this release offer little ones the chance to sing along with such traditional tunes as "Jingle Bells", "Frosty the Snowman", and "Jingle Bell Rock", but it also offers a variety of fun activities such as the Christmas ornament counting game which encourages learning in youngsters while simultaneously entertaining them.
response.tagline: Christmas images and classic carols combine to offer a fun and educational introduction to the holidays in this release that proves it's never to early to get into the Christmas spirit.
response.title: Brainy Baby - Jingle Bells
